  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    com.brightcove.freewheel.cuepoint.AdCuePointComponent.AD_COMPLETE
    As of 4.6.0, replaced by EventType.AD_COMPLETED.
    com.brightcove.freewheel.cuepoint.AdCuePointComponent.AD_START
    As of 4.6.0, replaced by EventType.AD_STARTED.
    com.brightcove.player.model.Video.Fields.CAPTIONING
    This has been replaced with CAPTION_SOURCES.
    com.brightcove.cast.GoogleCastComponent.CAST_TARGET_ACTIVITY
    As of 4.6.0, no longer supported.
    com.brightcove.cast.GoogleCastComponent.CAST_UPDATED_CONTEXT
    As of 4.6.0, no longer supported.
    com.brightcove.ima.GoogleIMAEventType.DID_COMPLETE_AD
    As of 4.6.0, replaced by EventType.AD_COMPLETED.
    com.brightcove.ima.GoogleIMAEventType.DID_PAUSE_AD
    As of 4.6.0, replaced by EventType.AD_PAUSED.
    com.brightcove.ima.GoogleIMAEventType.DID_RESUME_AD
    As of 4.6.0, replaced by EventType.AD_RESUMED.
    com.brightcove.ima.GoogleIMAEventType.DID_START_AD
    As of 4.6.0, replaced by EventType.AD_STARTED.
    com.brightcove.player.display.SeamlessVideoDisplayComponent.MAX_POSITION
    Use Event.MAX_POSITION instead.
    com.brightcove.player.display.SeamlessVideoDisplayComponent.MIN_POSITION
    Use Event.MIN_POSITION instead.
    com.brightcove.player.view.BrightcovePlayer.POSITION
    As of 4.5.3, replaced by LifecycleUtil.POSITION.
    com.brightcove.player.view.BrightcovePlayerFragment.POSITION
    As of 4.5.3, replaced by LifecycleUtil.POSITION.
    com.brightcove.player.analytics.Analytics.Fields.PUBLISHER_ID
    As of 4.2.7, replaced by Analytics.Fields.ACCOUNT.
    com.brightcove.player.model.Video.Fields.SUBTITLE_SOURCES
    This has been replaced with CAPTION_SOURCES.
    com.brightcove.vmap.VideoAdPlayer.VIDEO_AD_COMPLETED
    As of 4.6.0, replaced by EventType.AD_COMPLETED.
    com.brightcove.vmap.VideoAdPlayer.VIDEO_AD_PAUSE
    As of 4.6.0, replaced by EventType.AD_PAUSED.
    com.brightcove.vmap.VideoAdPlayer.VIDEO_AD_RESUME
    As of 4.6.0, replaced by EventType.AD_RESUMED.
    com.brightcove.vmap.VideoAdPlayer.VIDEO_AD_STARTED
    As of 4.6.0, replaced by EventType.AD_STARTED.
    com.brightcove.player.view.BrightcovePlayer.WAS_PLAYING
    As of 4.5.3, replaced by LifecycleUtil.WAS_PLAYING.
    com.brightcove.player.view.BrightcovePlayerFragment.WAS_PLAYING
    As of 4.5.3, replaced by LifecycleUtil.WAS_PLAYING.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.brightcove.player.view.BaseVideoView.addSubtitleSource(InputStream, MediaFormat)
    As of 4.3.9, replaced by BaseVideoView.addSubtitleSource(android.net.Uri,com.brightcove.player.captioning.BrightcoveCaptionFormat).
    com.brightcove.player.display.VideoDisplayComponent.getSurfaceView()
    As of 4.2.9, replaced by VideoDisplayComponent.getRenderView().
    com.brightcove.player.view.BrightcoveClosedCaptioningView.initialize(EventEmitter)
    Please use the initiliaze(EventEmitter, BaseVideoView) method instead.
    com.brightcove.ima.GoogleIMAComponent.initializeAdsRequests()
    It's no longer necessary to call this method. The initialization of Ad Rules happens automatically now.
    com.brightcove.player.captioning.LoadCaptionsService.loadCaptions(URI)
    As of 4.3.9, replaced by LoadCaptionsService.loadCaptions(android.net.Uri,java.lang.String).
    com.brightcove.onceux.OnceUxComponent.processVideo(String, String)
    use OnceUxComponent.processVideo(String) instead.
    com.brightcove.player.controller.BrightcoveClosedCaptioningController.readClosedCaptioningState()
    As of 4.3.9, replaced by BrightcoveClosedCaptioningController.isCaptioningEnabled().
    com.brightcove.freewheel.controller.FreeWheelController.setAdManagerURL(String)
    com.brightcove.player.view.BaseVideoView.setMediaController(MediaController, View, MediaController.MediaPlayerControl)
    Use #setMediaController(MediaController) instead.
    com.brightcove.player.view.BaseVideoView.setVideoPath(String, String)
    This method has been replaced with setVideoPath(String, Map).
  • Deprecated Constructors

    com.brightcove.freewheel.controller.FreeWheelController(Activity, SurfaceView, EventEmitter, IAdManager)
